column4: how do i install gnome 3 in 12.04. I installed gnome-shell ,but it doesn't load despite the many webpages that say it does.
you have to logout, and select gnome3 at the login screen from the popup menu.
I did, but I get an error that says "Failed to load Gnome"
hmm, yea I dunno, it just worked for me.
What ppa did you get it from?
none special that I know of.  Whatever's configured out of the box on a new install.
